title: Khloé Kardashian receives pink diamond ring from ex-boyfriend Tristan Thompson
text:
Cape Town - Diamonds are a girl’s best friend and Khloé Kardashian just gained a new one – thanks to baby daddy Tristan Thompson.

The pair, who split up earlier this year following the basketball star’s alleged affair with family friend Jordyn Woods, have been co-parenting their daughter, True.

But it looks like their romance might be far from over especially after the luxurious gift Khloé recently received, E News reported.

In the latest episode of Keeping up with the Kardashians season 17, the 35-year-old reality star reveals the pink diamond stunner she received from the 28-year-old.

"Look what Tristan gave me last night – a pink diamond,” she says. But Scott Disick, sister Kourtney’s baby daddy, believes it’s much more than a ring, People reported.

"It looks fully like an engagement [ring]," he says while examining the gift.

"Nope! No!" Khloé says quickly.

While Khloé may or may not be “toying” with the idea of getting back together with her estranged beau, this isn’t the first expensive gift he’s given the mother of his child, according to Cosmopolitan.

Earlier in September he purchased a Porsche 911 for her which is estimated to be worth £400 000 (about R7.4 million), The Sun reported.

Sources: E!News, The Sun, People, Cosmopolitan
